name: /System/
description:
Defeat the Viruses, or be Defeated.

You have managed to hack your way into you virus-filled computer and now its your turn (screw antiviruses) to dish out some hate to those nasty bugs.

This game is hella Broken. ran out of time for Ludum Dare 48 bc of school. my bad..

CONTROLS:
WASD - Move
SHIFT - Sprint/Wallride
SPACE - Jump (from ground or wall)
RIGHT MOUSE - Aim
LEFT MOUSE - Fire
E - Interact


thanks for playing!
